title: I cant use my new character
body: I just bought the character singed, and i was quite excited. I searched for a game, found one, and when i got to the selection screen, singed is grey out and says "this character is temporarily disabled." If anyone could help me i would appreciate it.

replies.body: Singed is currently disabled due to an in-game issue.  Stay up to date on this through our current [service status](http://status.leagueoflegends.com/#na) page.  Hopefully, he'll be back on the rift in no time!
